discussion_comments.comment_body: The name of the label is not consistent with our naming scheme (no spaces, but slashes). Maybe, just `test/export`?

commented_code:
pass_filenames: false
   files: ^(.*/)?poetry\.lock$
   args: ["-f", "requirements.txt", "-o", "requirements.txt"]
+
+- id: poetry-update
+  name: poetry-update

discussion_comments.comment_body: IMO, this ID/name is a bit misleading since the hook does not run `poetry update`. Maybe, `poetry-sync` would be a better name?
